name: EDMA
description: Management application that allows the specialist to have a better communication with the pacients and other specialists. It also provides a better organization of the documentation for each pacient and gives more flexibility to decide the future plans for the pacient
medicalAudience: Psycilogist, psychiatrics and nutritionists that seek to have a better organization, communication and planning with pacients that suffer from ACT and fellow collegues that work with the same pacient in a different medical speciality.
